api_list.api_description: Predicts the gender of a single name, optionally scoped to a specific country.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name to predict gender for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Country code for localization following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

api_list.api_description: Get the public IPv4 address in JSON, JSONP, or text format.

query: What is the predicted gender of the name 'Alex' in the US, and what is my current public IPv4 address?

api_list.api_description: Predicts the gender of multiple names in one request, optionally scoped to a specific country.

required_parameters.name: names
required_parameters.description: The names to predict genders for, maximum 10 names.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Country code for localization following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

api_list.api_description: Get the public IP address (IPv4/IPv6) in JSON, JSONP, or text format.

query: Can you determine the genders of the names 'Taylor', 'Jordan', and 'Alex' localized in Canada? Additionally, can you tell me my current public IP address?
